title: Design of Online Interaction-Based Foundational Chemistry Education for First-Year Students

context.additional_context: Online media and real-time interactive educational environment enabling learners from diverse majors (medical, legal, technical) to connect foundational chemistry knowledge with their respective fields.

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic chemistry concepts (atomic structure, chemical reactions, chemical calculations) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can submit PBL artifacts explaining the relevance of chemistry concepts to their chosen major field
Learners improve chemistry problem-solving skills by over 70% through online quizzes and video content
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
